issue.title: [Python] Expose more IPC write options in Python
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9333](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9333). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We want to allow Python users to use the latest metadata version and/or enable buffer compression.
